qas.question: What are some of the theories and philosophies produced by Buddhist scholars?

answers.text: Abhidharma, Buddhist philosophy and Reality in Buddhism

qas.question: Does Buddhism encourage or discourage doctrinal studies?

answers.text: Some schools of Buddhism discourage doctrinal study, and some regard it as essential practice.

qas.question: Who has produced a number of theories and concepts such as Abhidharma and Reality in Buddhism?
Some schools within Buddhism discourage what type of study?

context: <a2_0>Buddhist scholars<a2_0/> have produced a number of intellectual theories, philosophies and world view concepts (see, for example, <a0_0>Abhidharma, Buddhist philosophy and Reality in Buddhism<a0_0/>). <a1_0>Some schools of Buddhism discourage <a3_0>doctrinal<a3_0/> study, and some regard it as essential practice.
